page.title: 01THE CIVIC CENTRE
page.content: The {Civic Centre }in {Braunstone }is at the centre of our housing area. It serves the community for official Town business. We have a Lady Mayoress _ Mrs. Jill Clayton. The Centre is used for {meetings, {sports, weddings,discos}and occasionally for large services, such as Remembrance Day. Because our own School Hall is too small to cater for all the children and many parents, we all go to the Civic Centre for our Harvest Festival. The Civic Centre is where the Town Council meets and it is available for hire and can accommodate many different functions.
